question_stem.en:
A 35-year-old woman comes to the office due to malaise and generalized weakness. The patient has type 1 diabetes mellitus and hypothyroidism for which she takes insulin and levothyroxine. She eats a balanced diabetic diet and exercises 5 times per week. Physical examination shows mild conjunctival pallor. Laboratory results are as follows:

Hemoglobin 10 g/dL
Mean corpuscular volume 118 μm³
Folate, serum 9 ng/mL (normal: 2.5-20)
Vitamin B₁₂, serum 60 pg/mL (normal: 200-800)
question_stem.zh:
一名35岁的女性因不适和全身无力前来就诊。该患者患有1型糖尿病和甲状腺功能减退症，正在使用胰岛素和左甲状腺素治疗。她吃均衡的糖尿病饮食，每周锻炼5次。体格检查显示轻度结膜苍白。实验室检查结果如下：

血红蛋白10 g/dL
平均红细胞体积118 μm³
血清叶酸9 ng/mL（正常值：2.5-20）
血清维生素B₁₂ 60 pg/mL（正常值：200-800）

question.en: Which of the following changes are most likely to be present in this patient? {{exhibit_1}}
question.zh: 该患者最有可能出现以下哪些变化？ {{exhibit_1}}

A.en: Serum gastrin ↑; Gastric pH ↑; Gastric parietal cell mass ↑
A.zh: 血清胃泌素↑；胃pH↑；胃壁细胞质量↑

B.en: Serum gastrin ↑; Gastric pH ↑; Gastric parietal cell mass ↓
B.zh: 血清胃泌素↑；胃pH↑；胃壁细胞质量↓

C.en: Serum gastrin ↓; Gastric pH ↓; Gastric parietal cell mass ↑
C.zh: 血清胃泌素↓；胃pH↓；胃壁细胞质量↑

D.en: Serum gastrin ↓; Gastric pH ↑; Gastric parietal cell mass ↑
D.zh: 血清胃泌素↓；胃pH↑；胃壁细胞质量↑

E.en: Serum gastrin ↑; Gastric pH ↓; Gastric parietal cell mass ↓
E.zh: 血清胃泌素↑；胃pH↓；胃壁细胞质量↓

explanation.en:
This patient with malaise, weakness, and conjunctival pallor has anemia due to vitamin B₁₂ (cobalamin) deficiency. With a history of autoimmune disease (eg, type 1 diabetes mellitus, Hashimoto thyroiditis) and a balanced diet, the most likely cause is pernicious anemia. This autoimmune condition occurs as a result of a CD4+ cell-mediated immune response against parietal cells in the body and fundus of the stomach; autoantibodies against parietal cell components are also produced in many patients but are less significant in the pathogenesis of disease.

Parietal cells normally produce hydrochloric acid and intrinsic factor. In pernicious anemia, progressive destruction of oxyntic (acid-producing) mucosa leads to loss of gastric parietal cell mass, resulting in:

Decreased hydrochloric acid secretion (achlorhydria), which increases gastric pH. Increased gastric alkalinity provides positive feedback for the production of gastrin (which normally stimulates parietal cell acid release). As a result, patients with pernicious anemia have elevated gastrin levels (Choices D and E).
Decreased intrinsic factor secretion, which impairs absorption of dietary vitamin B₁₂ in the terminal ileum. Vitamin B₁₂ deficiency leads to megaloblastic anemia, as in this patient with an increased mean corpuscular volume, and subacute combined degeneration of the spinal cord.

(Choice A) Proton pump inhibitors increase gastric pH, which upregulates gastrin secretion. Prolonged use may result in secondary hypertrophy and hyperplasia of gastric parietal cells, a finding not seen in pernicious anemia.

(Choice C) Gastrinomas are gastrin-secreting tumors that typically develop in the pancreas and duodenum. Because parietal cells respond appropriately in this condition, the excess gastrin production results in parietal cell hypertrophy and increased hydrochloric acid secretion (ie, decreased gastric pH).

Educational objective:
Pernicious anemia is an autoimmune disease characterized by CD4+ cell-mediated destruction of parietal cells. Because these cells normally produce hydrochloric acid, patients with pernicious anemia have elevated gastric pH, which upregulates gastrin secretion. Decreased parietal cell secretion of intrinsic factor also results in vitamin B₁₂ deficiency (eg, megaloblastic anemia). {{exhibit_2}}
explanation.zh:
该患者出现不适、乏力和结膜苍白，是由于维生素B₁₂（钴胺素）缺乏引起的贫血。结合自身免疫性疾病病史（如1型糖尿病、桥本甲状腺炎）和均衡饮食，最可能的原因是恶性贫血。这种自身免疫性疾病是由于CD4+细胞介导的免疫反应针对胃体和胃底的壁细胞引起的；许多患者也会产生针对壁细胞成分的自身抗体，但在疾病的发病机制中意义较小。

壁细胞通常产生盐酸和内因子。在恶性贫血中，产酸性粘膜的进行性破坏导致胃壁细胞质量丧失，导致：

盐酸分泌减少（无酸症），导致胃pH值升高。胃碱度的升高对胃泌素的产生提供正反馈（胃泌素通常刺激壁细胞释放酸）。因此，患有恶性贫血的患者胃泌素水平升高（选项D和E）。
内因子分泌减少，从而损害膳食维生素B₁₂在末端回肠中的吸收。维生素B₁₂缺乏导致巨幼细胞性贫血，如该患者平均红细胞体积增大，以及脊髓亚急性联合变性。

（选项A）质子泵抑制剂增加胃pH值，从而上调胃泌素的分泌。长期使用可能导致胃壁细胞继发性肥大和增生，这种情况在恶性贫血中未见。

（选项C）胃泌素瘤是分泌胃泌素的肿瘤，通常发生在胰腺和十二指肠。由于壁细胞在这种情况下反应适当，过量的胃泌素产生导致壁细胞肥大和盐酸分泌增加（即胃pH值降低）。

教育目标：
恶性贫血是一种自身免疫性疾病，其特征是CD4+细胞介导的壁细胞破坏。由于这些细胞通常产生盐酸，患有恶性贫血的患者胃pH值升高，从而上调胃泌素的分泌。壁细胞分泌内因子减少也会导致维生素B₁₂缺乏（例如巨幼细胞性贫血）。 {{exhibit_2}}

summary.en:
This question tests knowledge of pernicious anemia, its pathophysiology, and the resulting changes in serum gastrin, gastric pH, and gastric parietal cell mass. Pernicious anemia is an autoimmune condition leading to vitamin B12 deficiency due to impaired intrinsic factor production. 

To solve this question, recognize the signs of vitamin B12 deficiency (anemia, increased MCV), consider the autoimmune history, and understand the relationship between parietal cell destruction, gastric pH, gastrin levels, and intrinsic factor production in pernicious anemia.
summary.zh:
此题考察对恶性贫血、其病理生理学以及由此导致的血清胃泌素、胃pH值和胃壁细胞质量变化的了解。恶性贫血是一种自身免疫性疾病，由于内因子产生受损导致维生素B12缺乏。

要解决这个问题，需要认识到维生素B12缺乏的迹象（贫血、MCV升高），考虑自身免疫病史，并了解恶性贫血中壁细胞破坏、胃pH值、胃泌素水平和内因子产生之间的关系。
